summary: Time-travel debugging with multiplayer support - replay and debug code execution sessions collaboratively with team members in real-time
novelty: Combines replay debugging with live collaboration
feasibility_notes: Can build on existing replay tools like rr or Chrome DevTools
WebRTC for real-time collaboration is mature
risks: High bandwidth requirements for replay data
Security implications of sharing execution traces
impact_hypothesis: Reduces debugging time for complex issues by 60% through parallel investigation and knowledge sharing

support: Pair programming studies show 40-60% faster bug fixes

retirement_reason: Superseded by v2 version which adopts async-first approach, improving feasibility while maintaining innovation through novel debugging collaboration
